    <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
    auto'><span style='mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"

    <meta content="Sharad Mehrotra" name=person>

    </span><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
    auto'><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><o:p> </o:p></span></b></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
    auto'><b><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'>Contact Information</span></b><span
    style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:
    SimSun'>2082 <ns0:PlaceName><span>Bren</ns0:PlaceName></span> <ns0:PlaceName><span>Hall</ns0:PlaceName></span><br>
    <ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span> of <ns0:State><span>California</ns0:State></span>
    at <ns0:City><span>Irvine</ns0:City></span><br>
    <ns0:place><span><ns0:City><span>Irvine</ns0:City></span>, <ns0:State><span>CA</ns0:State></span>
     <ns0:PostalCode><span>92697-3425</ns0:PostalCode></span><br>
     <ns0:country-region><span>USA</ns0:country-region></span></ns0:place></span>
    </span></i><i><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><o:p></o:p></span></i></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;margin-right:-322.5pt;
    mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto'><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'>Office:
    ICS 424<br>
    Office Tel: +1(<span class=GramE>949)824</span>-5975<br>
    Office Fax: +1(949)824-4056<span style='color:white'><br>
    </span>E-mail: <span class=SpellE><span style='color:blue'>sharad</span></span><span
    style='color:blue'>@ <span class=SpellE>ics</span> dot <span class=SpellE>uci</span>
    dot <span class=SpellE>edu</span> </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Office Hours<o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <p>Thurs: 11-12 or by appointment via email.</p>
    <p><o:p> </o:p></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Administrative Assistant<o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <p>Mary Carrillo</p>
    <p><span class=SpellE><span class=GramE><span style='color:blue'>mlcarril</span></span></span><span
    class=GramE><span style='color:blue'>@</span></span><span style='color:
    blue'> <span class=SpellE>ics</span> dot <span class=SpellE>uci</span> dot <span
    class=SpellE>edu</span></span><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><br>
    Office Tel: +1(949)824-3289<br>
    Office Fax: +1(949)824-4056</span></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Links <o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><a
    href="projects.html">Past Projects</a></span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><a
    href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~sharad/personal-home-page">Personal Home Page</a><o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='color:white'><a
    href="pubs.html">Publication List </a><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
    <p><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><a href="students.html">Students
    (Past & Present)</a><o:p></o:p></b></p>
    <h3><o:p> </o:p></h3>
    </td>
    <td width="80%" valign=top style='width:80.3%;padding:6.0pt 6.0pt 6.0pt 6.0pt'>
    <h3 align=center style='text-align:center'><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Sharad
    Mehrotra, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>Professor of Computer
    Science</i><o:p></o:p></span></h3>
    <h3>Research Areas</h3>
    <h3><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:
    bold'>Data Management Systems, Distributed Systems, Sensor-based Pervasive
    Systems, Situational Awareness, Data Quality, Data Privacy, Emergency
    Response Technologies<o:p></o:p></span></h3>
    <h3>Research Centers</h3>
    <h3 style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
    font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><a
    href="http://cert.ics.uci.edu/">Center for Emergency Response Technologies
    (CERT</a>)<o:p></o:p></span></h3>
    <h3 style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
    font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><a
    href="http://www.calit2.uci.edu/">California Institute Telecommunication
    & Information Technology (Calit2</a>)<o:p></o:p></span></h3>
    <h3 style='margin:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
    font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><a
    href="http://isg.ics.uci.edu/">Information Systems Research Group (ISG)</a><o:p></o:p></span></h3>
    <h3 style='margin-left:91.0pt;text-indent:-91.0pt'><o:p> </o:p></h3>
    <h3 style='margin-left:91.0pt;text-indent:-91.0pt'>Biography</h3>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Sharad
    Mehrotra is a Professor in the <ns0:PlaceType><span>School</ns0:PlaceType></span>
    of <ns0:PlaceName><span>Information</ns0:PlaceName></span> and Computer
    Science at <ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span> of <ns0:PlaceName><span>California</ns0:PlaceName></span>,
    <ns0:place><span><ns0:City><span>Irvine</ns0:City></span></ns0:place></span>
    and Director of <span class=GramE>the  Center</span> for Emergency
    Response Technologies (CERT) at UCI. He also serves as the Director and PI of
    the RESCUE project (Responding to Crisis and Unexpected Events) which,
    funded by NSF through its large ITR program, spans 7 schools and consists
    of 60 members. He is associated with the Cal-IT2 institute -- a
    multidisciplinary research facility spanning <ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span>
    of <ns0:PlaceName><span>California</ns0:PlaceName></span>, <ns0:City><span>Irvine</ns0:City></span>
    and <ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span> of <ns0:PlaceName><span>California</ns0:PlaceName></span>,
    <ns0:place><span><ns0:City><span>San Diego</ns0:City></span></ns0:place></span>.
    He is the recipient of Outstanding Graduate Student Mentor Award in 2005.
    Prior to joining UCI, me was a member of the faculty at <ns0:place><span><ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span>
     of <ns0:PlaceName><span>Illinois</ns0:PlaceName></span></ns0:place></span>,
    Urbana Champaign in the Department of Computer Science where he was the
    recipient of the C. W. Gear Outstanding Junior Faculty Award. Mehrotra has
    also served as a Scientist at Matsushita Information
    Technology Laboratory immediately after graduating with a Ph.D. from <ns0:PlaceType><span>University</ns0:PlaceType></span> of
    <ns0:PlaceName><span>Texas</ns0:PlaceName></span> at <ns0:place><span><ns0:City><span>Austin</ns0:City></span></ns0:place></span>(1988-1993).<o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'>Mehrotra's</span></span><span style='font-size:
    11.0pt'> research expertise is in data management and distributed systems
    areas in which he has made many pioneering contributions. Two such
    contributions include the concept of "database as a service<span
    class=GramE>"  and</span> "use of information retrieval
    techniques, particularly</span> <span style='font-size:11.0pt'>relevance
    feedback, in multimedia search". Mehrotra is a recipient of numerous
    best paper nominations and awards <span class=GramE>including  SIGMOD</span>
    Best Paper award in 2001 for a paper entitled  "<i>Locally Adaptive
    Dimensionality Reduction for Indexing Large Time Series Databases</i>",
    Best of VLDB 1994 submissions for a paper entitled </span><i><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <u3:WordDocument>
  <u3:View>Normal</u3:View>
  <u3:Zoom>0</u3:Zoom>
  <u3:PunctuationKerning/>
  <u3:ValidateAgainstSchemas/>
  <u3:SaveIfXMLInvalid>false</u3:SaveIfXMLInvalid>
  <u3:IgnoreMixedContent>false</u3:IgnoreMixedContent>
  <u3:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>false</u3:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>
  <u3:Compatibility>
   <u3:BreakWrappedTables/>
   <u3:SnapToGridInCell/>
   <u3:WrapTextWithPunct/>
   <u3:UseAsianBreakRules/>
   <u3:DontGrowAutofit/>
   <u3:UseFELayout/>
  </u3:Compatibility>
  <u3:BrowserLevel>MicrosoftInternetExplorer4</u3:BrowserLevel>
 </u3:WordDocument>
    </xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <u4:LatentStyles DefLockedState="false" LatentStyleCount="156">  </u4:LatentStyles>
    </xml><![endif]-->"Concurrency Control in Hierarchical <span
    class=SpellE>Multidatabase</span> System", </span></i><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun'>best paper award in
    DASFAA 2004<i> </i>for the paper entitled<i> "<span style='color:black'>Efficient
    Execution of Aggregation Queries over Encrypted Databases</span></i><span
    style='color:black'>", best paper award nomination for a paper
    entitled </span></span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>Neighborhoods:
    A framework for enabling web-based synchronous collaboration and
    hierarchical Navigation </span></i><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
    mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>at<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
    normal'> </i>HIICS, 1996, and a best student paper award at </span>IEEE
    Workshop on Multimodal Sentient Computing: Sensors, Algorithms and Systems
    (WMSC 2007) held in conjunction with IEEE CVPR (Computer Vision and Pattern
    Recognition) 2007.</p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p> </o:p></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Mehrotra's</span>
    current research focuses on building sentient spaces using multimodal
    sensors, data privacy, and data quality. <span class=SpellE>Mehrotra's</span>
    recent research, particularly, in the context of RESCUE & CERT has
    focused on situational awareness from multimodal input including
    conversational speech data. Many of his research contributions have been
    incorporated into software <span class=GramE>artifacts which</span> are now
    in use at various first responder partner sites. </p>
    <h3>Selected Publications</h3>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>1.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>Y. <span class=SpellE>Rui</span>,
    T. Huang, M. <span class=SpellE>Ortgega</span> and S. Mehrotra, <b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>"Relevance Feedback: A Power Tool
    in Interactive Content-Based Image Retrieval"</b>. <i
    style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>IEEE Trans. on Circuits and Systems for
    Video Technology, </i>Vol. 8, No. 5, Pages 644-655, <span class=GramE>September,</span>
    1998. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
    normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;mso-themecolor:accent2'>An early paper
    on relevance feedback in image retrieval. </span></i></b></span><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>2.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'>K. <span class=SpellE>Chakrabarti</span>, E.
    Keogh, M. <span class=SpellE>Pazzani</span> and <ns0:place><span>S.
     Mehrotra</ns0:place></span>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>"Locally
    Adaptive Dimensionality Reduction for Indexing Large Time Series
    Databases"</b>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>ACM Transactions
    on Database Systems. </i><span class=GramE><span style='color:black'>TODS</span></span><span
    style='color:black'> 27(2): 188-228 (2002). </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;
    mso-themecolor:accent2'>Winner of IGMOD best paper</span></i></b><span
    style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>3.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>H. <ns1:Sn><span><span
     class=SpellE>Hacigumus</span></ns1:Sn></span>, <ns0:PersonName><span><ns1:GivenName><span>B.</ns1:GivenName></span>
     <ns1:Sn><span><span class=SpellE>Iyer</span></ns1:Sn></span></ns0:PersonName></span>,
    <ns0:PersonName><span><ns1:GivenName><span>C.</ns1:GivenName></span> <ns1:Sn><span>Li</ns1:Sn></span></ns0:PersonName></span>
    and <ns1:GivenName><span>S.</ns1:GivenName></span> Mehrotra, <b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>"Executing SQL over Encrypted Data
    in Database- Service-Provider-Models "</b>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
    normal'>ACM SIGMOD 2002 conference. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
    style='color:#C0504D;mso-themecolor:accent2'>Winner of SIGMOD Test of Time
    award in 2012</span></b></i><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>4.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    class=SpellE><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Hakan</span></span><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'> <span class=SpellE>Hacigumus</span>, <span
    class=SpellE>Bala</span> <span class=SpellE>Iyer</span>, Sharad Mehrotra. <b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Secure Computation over Outsourced
    Data: A 10-Year Retrospective.</b> DASFAA 2014. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;
    mso-themecolor:accent2'>Invited Paper accompanying the 10 Year Best Paper
    Award in DASFAA 2014.</span></i></b><span style='layout-grid-mode:line'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>5.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'>Chen Li, Sharad Mehrotra, Liang Jin. <b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Record Linkage: A 10-Year Retrospective</b>.
    DASFAA (1) 2013: 3-12. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
    style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;mso-themecolor:
    accent2'>Invited Paper Accompanying the <span class=GramE>10 Year</span>
    Best Paper Award in DASFAA 2013.</span></i></b><span style='layout-grid-mode:
    line'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>6.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'>S. Mehrotra, </span><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'>C. <span class=GramE>Butt ,</span> D. Kalashnikov,
    N. <span class=SpellE>Venkatasubramanian</span>, R. <span class=SpellE>Rao</span>,
    G. <span class=SpellE>Chockalingam</span>, R. <span class=SpellE>Eguchi</span>,
    B. Adams C. <span class=SpellE>Huyck</span>,<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><span style='color:black'> Project RESCUE: Challenges in Responding
    to the Unexpected,</span></b><span style='color:black'> SPIE Internet
    Imaging Conference, 2004 <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
    style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>( </i></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;
    mso-themecolor:accent2'>an early paper addressing the role of IT innovation
    in bringing transformation advances to<span style="mso-spacerun:yes"> 
    </span>crisis response ) </span></i></b><span style='color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
    l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><span
    style='mso-list:Ignore'>7.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>    
    </span></span></span><![endif]><span class=SpellE><span style='font-size:
    11.0pt'>Liyan</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt'> Zhang, Dmitri
    Kalashnikov, Sharad Mehrotra. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>A
    Unified Framework for Context Assisted Face Clustering</b>. 2013 ACM
    International Conference on Multimedia Retrieval. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;
    mso-themecolor:accent2'>Winner of <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>est</span></span>
    paper award</span></i></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>8.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'>Dmitri Kalashnikov; Sharad Mehrotra. <b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Domain-independent data cleaning via
    analysis of entity-relationship graph</b></span><span style='font-size:
    11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>, </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
    color:black'>In ACM Transactions on Database Systems (ACM TODS) 2006. <span
    class=GramE>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
    normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;mso-themecolor:accent2'> an</span></i></b></span></span><b
    style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:#C0504D;mso-themecolor:accent2'> early paper
    on relational approach to entity resolution</span></i></b><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt;color:black'>) <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoListParagraphCxSpLast style='margin-bottom:4.0pt;mso-add-space:
    auto;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 49.5pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>9.<span
    style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     </span></span></span><![endif]><span
    class=SpellE><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Lazaridis</span></span><span
    style='font-size:11.0pt'>, <ns0:place><span>S. Mehrotra</ns0:place></span>,
    Optimization <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>of Multi-version
    Expensive Predicates</b>, ACM SIGMOD 2007 (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='color:#C0504D;
    mso-themecolor:accent2'>a paper with “unrealized” potential</span></i></b>).
    <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:4.0pt'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
    mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:4.0pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><span style='font-size:13.5pt;layout-grid-mode:line'>Current
    /Ongoing Projects<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:4.0pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
    normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:line'><o:p> </o:p></span></b></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><a href="http://sherlock.ics.uci.edu">Sherlock Project </a>on
    novel directions of improving data quality particularly focused on
    interactive and progressive data cleaning in the context of big data
    analysis and applications<span class=GramE>..</span> Sherlock is funded by
    NSF Grant <a href="http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1118114">1118114</a>.
    </p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><a href="radicle.ics.uci.edu">Radicle Project</a> on a
    risk-based approach to data processing in mixed security environments with
    the focus on cloud computing. Radicle is funded by NSF Grant <a
    href="http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1118127&HistoricalAwards=false">1118127</a>
    and <a
    href="http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1212943&HistoricalAwards=false">1212943</a></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><a href="http://i-sensorium.ics.uci.edu/">I-Sensorium
    Project</a> on creating a pervasive computing <span class=SpellE>testbed</span>
    at UCI. I-sensorium is funded through NSF Grant <a
    href="http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1059436&HistoricalAwards=false">1059436</a></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal><o:p> </o:p></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:4.0pt'><span class=MsoHyperlink><span
    style='layout-grid-mode:line'><a href="http://www.ics.uci.edu/~dsm/cypress/">Cypress
    Project</a></span></span><span style='layout-grid-mode:line'> on cyber physical
    system resilience and <span class=GramE>sustainability .</span> Cypress is
    funded through NSF Grant<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> <a
    href="http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1063596&HistoricalAwards=false">1063596</a></b></span><span
    class=MsoHyperlink><span style='font-family:Times'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
